goals.active: Create a distraction at the Nightmare Court camp, so Caithe can sneak out with the white stag.
goals.complete: I created a distraction and challenged Sariel of the Nightmare Court, while Caithe snuck through their campsite at Hemlock Coil. With a little defiance and a lot of good fortune, the white stag is free again. Now we will take it to the Grove, where the stag will be safe.
